item.description:
The Membership Committee & Kathe D. have worked hard to arrange this lovely event.

An afternoon at the exclusive Brae Burn Country Club!!

Please join us for an afternoon soiree of hearty hors d’ouevres, cocktails, great conversation and light music at the beautiful and lovely Brae Burn Country Club in Newton.

Brae Burn is known for its’ famous golf course. It was initially developed in the late 1700′s and redesigned by legendary architect Donald Ross in the early 1800′s. It remains a classic championship course today.

This is a great venue for an afternoon for friends old and new.

This event is for Sitz members and their invited guests as well as outside guests. It is a tradition that the Sitzundjibers Social Club has kept ongoing for many years.

The afternoon includes hearty hors d’oeuvres, a cash bar, stimulating conversation, live music, and meeting many new faces.

Please RSVP only if you really have intentions of attending...we need to supply a head count for the food!

The cost for guests is $30. You pay at the door. Paypal is not accepted.

Directions: Brae Burn is located in West Newton near Washington St. and Commonwealth Ave. The actual address is 326 Fuller St. West Newton, 02465. You can enter the parking lot from Commonwealth Ave. You will be right in front of the club. There is plenty of parking around the building.

This will be a lovely late afternoon gathering. See you there!!
item.how_to_find_us: 2nd floor, we have a large gathering area
item.name: Sitz's Annual reaching out to the New Faces that have been attending our events
